mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mem(memno, mem_img, mem_id, mem_pw, mem_name, mem_yy, mem_mm, mem_dd, mem_telecom, mem_phone, mem_email, signdate) VALUES (mem_seq.nextval, null, #{mem_id}, #{mem_pw}, #{mem_name}, #{mem_yy}, #{mem_mm}, #{mem_dd}, #{mem_telecom}, #{mem_phone}, #{mem_email}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT memno, mem_img ,mem_id, mem_pw, mem_name, mem_yy, mem_mm, mem_dd, mem_telecom, mem_phone, mem_email, signdate, memlvno FROM mem ORDER BY memlvno ASC, memno ASC
